flawed_nl_solution:
His total expenditure so far is $50+$35+$15 = $<<50+35+15=100>>100
To make a profit of 10%, he has to make a total of $100+($100*(10/100)) = $<<100+(100*(10/100))=140>>140 from sales
To make $140 from the sales of 10 bags, each bag should cost $140/10 = $<<140/10=14>>14

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 110.0, not 140.0. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
